LanguageData.FireFightingTip: Whether a tenant should help with fighting fires.
LanguageData.BasicTip: Whether a tenant should help with basic work like flicking.
LanguageData.HaulingTip: Whether a tenant should help with hauling.
LanguageData.CleaningTip: Whether a tenant should help with cleaning.
LanguageData.MayJoinTip: Whether a tenant may request to join your colony permanently.
LanguageData.TerminateTip: Terminate the contract early thus making the payment void.
LanguageData.AutoRenewTip: Whether a tenant can automagically renew the contract at the expiry date.
LanguageData.MinDailyCost: The minimum a tenant must pay to stay daily: {0}
LanguageData.MaxDailyCost: The maximum a tenant must pay to stay daily: {0}
LanguageData.MinContractTime: The minimum amount of days a contract entails: {0}
LanguageData.MaxContractTime: The maximum amount of days a contract entails: {0}
LanguageData.StayChanceHappy: The chance a tenant will ask to prolong a contract if happy: {0}
LanguageData.StayChanceNeutral: The chance a tenant will ask to prolong a contract if satisfied: {0}
LanguageData.LevelOfHappiness: The amount of happiness needed for a tenant to be considered happy: {0}
LanguageData.TenantWeaponry: If a tenant may spawn with a weapon.
LanguageData.TenantApparel: If a tenant should spawn with less costly clothing.
LanguageData.SimpleClothingMax: The maximum amount a tenants clothing may be worth: {0}
LanguageData.CourierCost: The cost for calling for courier services: {0}
LanguageData.MinRelation: The minimum amount of relation change events and envoys gives: {0}
LanguageData.MaxRelation: The minimum amount of relation change events and envoys gives: {0}
LanguageData.AvailableRaces: The amount of races available for tenancy.
